================
### Aviation Professional Services
#### Tender Notice

**Reference:** cb-4455-6134798
**Amendment:** 1
**Publication Date:** 2023-03-27
**Closing Date:** 2023-04-26T14:00:00

**Description:**
The government of Canada invites proposals from qualified contractors to provide aviation professional services. The services required include expertise in aviation development, planning, and design, as well as transportation project business case development.

**Objective:**
The proposed contract aims to achieve the following objectives:

* Develop a Roadmap/Project Plan to guide the studies and consultation process
* Assist Transport Canada in reviewing and assessing the studies
* Develop options and recommendations to address future demand on potentially constrained aviation services capacity in Southern Ontario and the GTA

**Scope of Work:**
The contractor will perform the following tasks:

* Develop a Roadmap/Project Plan that outlines the scope of work required to meet the project's objectives
* Review, assess, and analyze available data, information, and research to provide comments on study products
* Meet with the Project Authority and departmental officials to discuss progress and requirements
* Develop a strategy and methodology to review and analyze study findings
* Provide advice, analysis, and recommendations to the Project Authority on study data and findings
* Perform other tasks as outlined in the Statement of Work

**Contract Details:**
The contract is for a period of one (1) year, with the possibility of two (2) option years. The contractor will be required to meet the project's objectives and deliverables.

**Submission Guidelines:**
Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Canada Buys website. The contract will be awarded to the contractor with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact Lisa Martin at lisa.martin@tc.gc.ca or (506) 863-5443.

### Attachment
The tender notice and associated documents can be found on the Canada Buys website.

### Trade Agreements
The contract is subject to various trade agreements, including CPTPP, CFTA, CUFTA, CKFTA, CPFTA, WTO GPA, Canada-Colombia FTA, Canada-Panama FTA, CCFTA, and CETA. živjeti The proposed contract seeks the services of a Contractor with expertise in aviation and airport services development, planning, and design, as well as transportation project business case development to:   - Develop a Roadmap/Project
